lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Alexander Pappas
[00:14.691] At break of day, in hope we rise
[00:18.422] We speak Your Name, we lift our eyes
[00:22.299] Tune our hearts into Your beat
[00:25.851] Where we walk, there You'll be
[00:29.435] With fire in our eyes, our lives a-light
[00:33.027] Your love untamed, it's blazing out
[00:36.685] The streets will glow forever bright
[00:40.327] Your glory's breaking through the night
[00:44.152] You will never fade away
[00:46.290] Your love is here to stay
[00:47.900] By my side, in my life, shining through me everyday
[00:51.674] You will never fade away
[00:53.575] Your love is here to stay
[00:55.170] By my side, in my life, shining through me everyday
[01:13.453] You wake within me, wake within me
[01:17.318] You're in my heart forever
[01:20.604] You wake within me, wake within me
[01:24.589] You're in my heart forever

[02:33.915] You wake within me, wake within me
[02:37.961] You're in my heart forever
[02:56.532] Forever, forever, forever in Your love
[03:03.829] Forever, forever, forever in Your love
[03:11.201] Forever, forever, forever in Your love
[03:18.497] Forever, forever, forever we know that...
[03:25.258] You will never fade away
[03:27.444] Your love is here to stay
[03:29.087] By my side, in my life, shining through me everyday
[03:32.773] You will never fade away
[03:34.777] Your love is here to stay
[03:36.389] By my side, in my life, shining through me everyday
[03:54.431] You wake within me, wake within me
[03:58.637] You're in my heart forever

tlyric:
[by:Ariel_Plata]
[00:14.691]新的一天到来，我们燃起希望
[00:18.422]我们称颂你的名，我们睁开双眼
[00:22.299]我们的心为你跳动
[00:25.851]我们走到哪里，哪里必有你在
[00:29.435]我们眼中有火，我们生活一片光明
[00:33.027]你的爱不受约束，熊熊燃烧
[00:36.685]街道永远明亮
[00:40.327]你的荣耀亮彻黑夜
[00:44.152]你永远不会消逝
[00:46.290]你的爱在这里停留
[00:47.900]停在我的身边，我的生命中，每天照耀我
[00:51.674]你永远不会消逝
[00:53.575]你的爱在这里停留
[00:55.170]停在我的身边，我的生命中，每天照耀我
[01:13.453]你和我一同醒来，一同醒来
[01:17.318]主永远在我心中

[01:24.589]主永远在我心中
